root.name: indexOf()
root.description: Tests to see if a substring is embedded in a string and returns the index position of the first occurance of the substring defined in the str parameter. If the str parameter is not found in the string, -1 is returned.

parameter.label: str
parameter.description: String: any variable of type String

parameter.label: fromIndex
parameter.description: int: the index from which to start the search
